Chatterbox

Barebones web-chat with no fuss

A simple chat application demonstrating basic HTML, CSS, Flask and Internet messaging.

Pathfinder

Off-Road Path Navigation

Using Keras and OpenCV, Pathfinder will highlight a navigable path on a video of off-road terrain. The model was trained on a small set of publically available data that was augmented to produce a useful set of training data.

Mark's Covid Tracker

Django-based Covid Tracker based on Bokeh Visualizations

Using Bokeh to create visualizations and Django to host the web pages, various interactive charts are presented to the user show pertinent country-wide, state and county-level trends in the spread of the COVID-19 in the US.
